record.id: field.name="msglog.lvl" and file.name="operator" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: msglog.lvl
record.file.name: operator

brief.brief: The level of messages to store in the message queue for this operator.
Leave this field blank to default to the Informational level and all messages are stored.
Message levels affect on-screen messages only and have nothing to do with the msglog table.

detail.detail: The selections in the drop-down list are:
Information: writes informational, action, and error messages to the message queue.
Action: only writes action and error messages to the message queue.
Error: only writes error messages to the message queue.
